title: Cato variegatus or Catoes morall distichs: translated and paraphras'd, with varations of expressing, in English verse. By Sr. Richard Baker Knight
author: Cato, Marcus Porcius, 234-149 B.C., attributed name.
publisher: Printed by Anne Griffin, and are to be sold by Anne Bowler dwelling at the signe of the Marigold in Paules church-yard,
notes: A translation of "Catonis disticha", which are not in fact by Cato.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
